title: Elise has an 83% ban rate now
body:
This is why you shouldn't listen to G&B, Riot, life was great when she wasn't viable and spammed in every game, giving her Q a nerf from 8% current HP to 4% current HP is hardly enough to make me want to let her get into a game since of the 17% of the games she isn't banned, she still gets an 8.5% pickrate. Don't keep buffing a champion until they are so broken that they are permabanned from the game and then will end up getting gutted down to...well...prebuffs Elise.

http://www.raid.ca/~/media/raid/products/raid_max_spider_blaster_bug_killer.png?sc_lang=en-CA
